original_text: The person that I have accepted as right will live. That person will live because he trusts me. But if anyone is afraid and he turns back, I will not be happy with that person.’ 10: See Habakkuk 2:4. Christians must continue to trust God when troubles come. The person that I have accepted as right will live. That person will live because he trusts me. But if anyone is afraid and he turns back, I will not be happy with that person.’ 10: See Habakkuk 2:4. Christians must continue to trust God when troubles come. The person that I have accepted as right will live.
korean_text: 나의 의인은 믿음으로 말미암아 살리라 또한 뒤로 물러가면 내 마음이 그를 기뻐하지 아니하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The person that I have accepted as right will live.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 의롭다고 받아들인 사람은 살 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That person will live because he trusts me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 나를 믿기 때문에 살 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will not be happy with that person.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 사람에게 기뻐하지 않을 것이다.
